Module takMashido.shani
Package takMashido.shani.core

Class Storage

java.lang.Object
takMashido.shani.core.Storage
public class Storage
extends java.lang.Object
Class for getting and saving data in Shani data files. Access to data is done by String containing path to it. It's form is standard java path. Names of nodes/elements divided with '.' Character.
Author:
TakMashido

  • Method Details

    • getNodes

      public static org.w3c.dom.NodeList getNodes​(java.lang.String path)
      Get nodes under given path in Storage part of data file. Creates new nodes if node pointed by path not exists and returns it.
      Parameters:
      path - Path to super node.
      Returns:
      NodeList pointed by given path.

    • getString

      public static ShaniString getString​(java.lang.String stringPath)
      Get ShaniString under given path in Storage part of file.
      Parameters:
      stringPath - Path to Node containing wanted ShaniString.
      Returns:
      ShaniString pointed by path.

      Returns:
      Stored value or false if not found.

      public static void writeUserData​(java.lang.String path, ShaniString data)

      Parameters:
      path - Path pointing to location in which data will be stored.
      data - Data to store.
